docs.text: Welcome to SquiggleKit Docs See the github repo to download the code SquiggleKit . SquiggleKit is a toolkit for accessing and manipulating nanopore signal data. It has also been designed to act as an introduction to the data files produced by Oxford Nanopore Technology sequencing devices. Overview The toolkit is broken down into two areas: File management fast5_fetcher SquigglePull Signal analysis segmenter.py MotifSeq.py
docs.title: Home
